content: ✩materials ↠ main yarn - sport or dk weight yarn in beige color i use yarn and colors must-have - 1 skein ↠ additional yarn - if you crochet the bunny from the cotton yarn you can use it as additional yarn too if you choose another main yarn be sure that it strong or use another stronger yarn as additional which matches the color - few meters ↠ crochet hook 2 5 mm ↠ stuffing ↠ ribbon and bells for decoration ✩size the toy is approx 4 75 inches tall the size may vary if you choose another weight of yarn and crochet hook number ✩abbreviations the pattern is written in english using us crochet terminology chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet increase - increase decrease - decrease sc3tog - single_crochet three together decrease rsc - reverse single_crochet
